entry.title: Green-Lazarsfeld property $N_p$ for Hibi rings
entry.summary: In this article, we prove some necessary conditions regarding when Hibi rings satisfy Green-Lazarsfeld property $N_p$ for $p=2$ and $3$. We also show that if a Hibi ring satisfies property $N_4$, then it is a polynomial ring or it has a linear resolution. Therefore, it satisfies property $N_p$ for all $p\geq 4$ as well. Moreover, we show that if a Hibi ring satisfies property $N_2$, then its Segre product with a polynomial ring in finitely many variables also satisfies property $N_2$. When the polynomial ring is in two variables, we also prove the above statement for $N_3$. Furthermore, we characterize complete intersection Hibi rings.
